EmailTemplate.name: Individual User Enablement Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Office Depot Partner Community!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Welcome to Office Depot's Partner Exchange. The ODPEX provides everything you will need to be a successful partner with Office Depot; including marketing materials, training, lead registration and escalation paths. If at any point in this process, you have questions, please reach out to channel support: channelsupport@officedepot.com. We are happy to help.
